title: Lose less LP from DC player?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/hoc5nDb.jpg

Suggestion, to lose less LP from a player DC'ing...For example in this game our support disconnected after the 4 minute mark therefore we couln't  remake and we ended up losing 4v5 so I lost 20lp

I suggest to reduce the lp lost if a player has dc'd for at least half the game and doesn't come back as it is really unfair for the team.
Sure, we can report the player(which we did) but it doesn't do anything to fix our lost LP, surrendering wouln't have solved it either.

If, for example, I would have been demoted it would have forced me to play multiple games to get back to where I am if i count the promo game which might have cost me multiple hours depending how they went.

replies.body:
From a very personal point, I think that losing games because a teammate abandons your team and leaves you a man down is the worst. Especially in Ranked, it's not the best feeling at all. Kinda makes you feel like a puppy that's been told to fend for yourself, or maybe a wolf without a pack.

Actually, wolf without a pack is a much better analogy. We're better than puppies.

Sadly, it's not really doable to reduce how much LP players lose in games with AFKs. Doing that could be open up the system for abuse, and test the integrity of the Ranked queue. For now, the only safe form of reducing LP loss is when widespread detectable issues affect many players in a region and we enable compensation mode. But there may come a point in the future where we're able to work something out. It remains to be seen.

Another must have feature that's gonna take years to get like the skins owned feature that's finally coming...in patch 7.23 of the game ( 8 years?).

He already gave you a way to eliminate the "abuse" problem. He said if the player has dc'd for at least half the game.Go beyond that and make it 75% if that makes you feel better, i'm sure it's not that hard to code and it is a temporal (after 8 years) fix.

We already get punished for inters, trolls, afk, smurfs and your hidden elo system isn't exactly helping either.We deserve at least that.

You won't spend resources on making a complex system that doesn't earn you cash unless your active players number decreases again and then you give people a new "hope". Moving this issue to the -soonâ„¢- list is a dirty move.
